[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@plotex/lib-apex](./lib-apex.md) &gt; [IMountOptions](./lib-apex.imountoptions.md)

## IMountOptions interface

Options to control how the chart is mounted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IMountOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [enableAnimations?](./lib-apex.imountoptions.enableanimations.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to false to disble animations in charts. Defaults to true. |
|  [makeStatic?](./lib-apex.imountoptions.makestatic.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to make the chart static. The chart will have interactive features and animations disabled. |
|  [showChartDef?](./lib-apex.imountoptions.showchartdef.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Debug log the chart definition after formatting. |
|  [showDownload?](./lib-apex.imountoptions.showdownload.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Enable/disable the download button. |
